title: Bug 130492Provide a method to serialize the report with library information.
description: Bug 130492Provide a method to serialize the report with library information.
OB: Currently, when engine generate the report document file, the document does not contain any library information. That will cause many propblem on server side.
EB: Model should provide a method to serialize the report with library information to a stream so that the generated report document can contain all information that the report need.
